name: dishes
description: Our dishes are inspired by the seasons, the ingredients we love, the trips that have taken us to other countries, meals shared with family or friends.

name: desserts
description: Our desserts are homemade, and products come from smal local producers. We aim to reduce sugar as much as possible. Click and discover.

name: drinks
description: Wild & The Moon drinks are vegan and homemade. We do not use refined sugars, additives, preservatives, GMOs, gluten or dairy products.
